title: Feather
description: A single feather slanted to one side. On most platforms it's light brown with a dark brown barred or striped pattern. Can be used to talk about feathers or birds, or to represent something that is lightweight, fluffy, or soft.
apple_vendor_description: A single, delicate feather floats gracefully on Apple devices, rendered with exquisite detail and a soft, ethereal glow. Its wispy barbs are depicted with subtle gradients and smooth, rounded edges, capturing the lightness and natural beauty of a bird's plume. On Apple devices, this emoji evokes feelings of peace, freedom, gentleness, and inspiration, often used to convey a sense of lightness or a soft touch in digital conversations.
